item.title: Bruschetta
item.description: Ingredients Tomatoes Garlic Onion Basil 1 Olive Oil Coarse Salt Directions Pile basil leaves on top of one another and roll into a log. Thinly slice basil into green confetti Dice tomatoes Loosely combine all ingredients without bruising them Footnotes Fresh from the garden makes all the difference ↩︎
